text: Odd Olsen Ingerø (born September 22, 1950) is a Norwegian civil servant. He was the Governor of Svalbard from 2001 to 2005 and again from 2009 to 2015. Ingerø was governor from 2001-2005, and came back in 2009 for a second term. For 20 years he was the chief of police in Kirkenes. == References == Category:1950 births Category:Norwegian politicians
title: Odd Olsen Ingerø
